errors_encountered.description: DEFINITION.md version/schema not synchronized with code
errors_encountered.fix: Updated DEFINITION.md Brain version 1.15.0→1.16.0 and Schema 018→021

learnings: Facts Consistency CI requires DEFINITION.md synchronization on every version/schema change
Version Sync CI requires .brain-versions file update via jq command
Schema version updates must sync test expectations in selfcheck.test.js
Pre-commit hooks must have corresponding scripts or fallback gracefully
Three-layer decomposition architecture with database-level consistency constraints prevents data integrity issues
